A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: How this has such a high critics score is beyond me only two Star Wars movies are worse than this\, phantom menace and attack of the clones\, let’s start with the pointless merchandise opportunities (The Porgs\, BB9\, Phasma) all unnecessary and don’t add to the story\, as for the story with the exception of Kylo Ren there is no character growth and Kylo’s is limited\, it answers none of the questions left unanswered after the force awakens\, the story is infantile with huge plot holes\, I’m not going to go into details as I don’t believe in spoilers\, Daisy Ridley’s acting is atrocious\, that said there are some good set pieces and action sequences although these alone get this to a measly 2.5 stars a lack of light sabre action is also disappointing
